backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text map of frontend file paths to short functional summaries for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom warm-toned OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling hash-based routing and wrapping pages in MainLayout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Departm: Renders a grid of department cards using typed data with optional limiting.
frontend/src/components/sections/EventsL: Displays a filterable events/news list with formatted dates and category badges.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Site footer with branding, social links, quick links, programs list, and contact details from config.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Responsive header with utility bar, branding, and mobile/desktop navigation driven by siteConfig.
Layout component adding shared header, footer, and page structure.
frontend/src/content/departments.ts: Defines Department type and a list of department metadata for display.
frontend/src/content/events.ts: Defines Event type and a list of events, news, and achievements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point mounting the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and core values sections.
frontend/src/pages/AcademicsPage.tsx: Renders the Academics page with academic highlights and a departments grid.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionsPage.tsx: Renders the admissions page with process steps and FAQs using cards and accordions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays institute contact details from config and a simple non-submitting inquiry form.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the home page with a hero banner, stats, program previews, and events section.
frontend/src/pages/NewsEventsPage.tsx: Shows categorized news and events using tabbed navigation and the EventsList component.
frontend/src/pages/PlacementsPage.tsx: Provides placement statistics, top recruiters, and support details through cards and badges.
frontend/src/siteConfig.ts: Defines global site branding, contact info, address, social links, and map URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths with plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines project version, goals, image needs, and required features for building a rebranded clone-style college website. Lists existing features, configuration expectations, and structured content requirements.
